title: Drawing, "Decorative Project with Prudence in Oval", ca. 1780
medium: Pen and brown ink on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Prudence, shown from front, seated. Head covered with helmet turned toward left. Looking glass in left hand. Snake winds around her right forearm.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Project with Prudence in Oval", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pen and brown ink on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3241.
